article: A man wanted to make an investment. An idea struck him: "Why don't I plant a small mango tree and enjoy the benefits when it grows into a big one?" So he went to the  _  , bought a small tree and took it home. To the pride of his family, he  _  it in the center of his  _  . He read everything about  _  a mango tree. He watered it,  _  it with manure ,and took good care of its leaves by removing those  _  ones. He made sure the tree received enough care. Many times he sat and  _  the beauty of the growing tree while dreaming about the  _  mangos that the tree would  _  . His mind was always filled with the wish to taste the first fruit of the tree. Years went by  _  ...Now, he had a big tree with its leaves shining and healthy, its bark healthy and hard. It was a big attraction  _  it decorated his whole garden. Then one day he noticed a small bud ,which in a couple of days grew into a beautiful  _  .Now he could hardly wait for the fruit, so he started to  _  his supply of nutrients and care. He waited for a few more weeks till the fruit grew in  _  .The day came when he decided to  _  the first fruit of the tree. Seeing this, his  _  came and asked him what happened. He told them that the fruit from his tree was not what he wanted. When the neighbors heard this, they did not know whether to  _  or comfort him, for what he planted years ago was not a mango tree. We can only reap what we plant.
